metadata.title: CVE-2020-12351 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - high
metadata.description:
Improper input validation in BlueZ may allow an unauthenticated user topotentially enable escalation of privilege via adjacent access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12351` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-130-generic - 5.15.0-130.140
linux-image-5.15.0-130-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-130.140
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-130-generic - 5.15.0-130.140
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-130-generic-64k - 5.15.0-130.140
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1071-kvm - 5.15.0-1071.76
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1019-azure-fde - 5.15.0-1019.24.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1057-gkeop - 5.15.0-1057.64
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1067-ibm - 5.15.0-1067.70
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-128-lowlatency - 5.15.0-128.138
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-128-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-128.138
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1004-nvidia - 6.5.0-1004.4
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1004-nvidia-64k - 6.5.0-1004.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-130.140').
linux-kvm package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1071.76').
linux-aws package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-1076.83').
linux-azure package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-1078.87').
linux-gcp package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-1073.81').

linux-raspi package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-1067.70').
linux-azure-fde package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1019.24.1').
linux-fips package in fips-updates/jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-128.138+fips1').
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-1074.80+fips1').

linux-gke package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-1071.77').
linux-gkeop package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1057.64').
linux-ibm package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1067.70').
linux-intel-iotg package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-1071.77').
linux-lowlatency package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-128.138').
linux-nvidia package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-1069.70').
linux-nvidia-6.5 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1004.4').
linux-realtime: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by Ubuntu Pro ppa version').
linux-xilinx-zynqmp package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-1040.44').
